summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Talent Acquisition Professional with over 17 years of experience. Heavily experienced within the National Security Sector with an emphasis in Sourcing and Capture. Take pleasure in Sourcing, Networking, and Strategizing. I am also the Facilitator of Project SAVE (Staffing Alliance of Virginia Employers) which is an organization catering to recruiters and networking. Project SAVE was founded by Gary Cluff in 1990. It has assisted recruiters, HR Professionals, and job seekers for over 23 years. To learn about monthly meetings, please visit and join our Meetup Group at: http://www.meetup.com/http-www-cluffassociates-com/ or visit our website at www.project-s-a-v-e.com.

summary: Since opening LawSchoolExpert.com in 2004, I have helped 2,000+ law school applicants reach their goals by crafting a strategy for each applicant's admission to law school. I am the author of the bestselling law school guide, "The Law School Admission Game: Play Like an Expert" and "The Law School Decision Game: A Playbook for Prospective Lawyers" available on Amazon.com and at lawschoolexpertbook.com. Previously, I served as: Director of Admissions, Loyola Law School, Los Angeles, CA Director of Admissions, California Western School of Law, San Diego, CA Director of Student Services, University of Denver College of Law, Denver, CO I have been admitted to practice law in California and ColoradoSpecialties:Law School Admission

summary: •Well experienced in counter surveillance and counter intelligence with a vast experience at the field. Managed risk management Projects worldwide with a special emphasis in Africa, mostly in hostile environments. Former Team Leader of a Clandestine Unit. Played an active role as Intel Analyst for 2008 Angolan elections, as well as TL for 2010 World Soccer Cup in South Africa, mostly developed in Cape Town. •OSINT/MENA, HUMINT & SIGINT Research Analyst. •Expertise: Surveillance, Counter Surveillance, Terrorism. •Founder and Master Project Manager of Global Risk Awareness. In cooperation with The Intelligence Community LLC, Flashpoint Partners, our data partner, Brand Energy and Digitalis (both companies responsible for all the lay out and development) GRA is a mobile application (app) that provides worldwide risk analysis and information that focuses on international security, which significantly benefits government, enterprises and independent users to assess the specific countries that require relations in order to conduct business operations in a safe, efficient, and secure manner.

summary: •Well experienced in counter surveillance and counter intelligence with a vast experience at the field. Managed risk management Projects worldwide with a special emphasis in Africa, mostly in hostile environments. Former Team Leader of a Clandestine Unit. Played an active role as Intel Analyst for 2008 Angolan elections, as well as TL for 2010 World Soccer Cup in South Africa, mostly developed in Cape Town. •OSINT/MENA, HUMINT & SIGINT Research Analyst. •Expertise: Surveillance, Counter Surveillance, Terrorism. •Founder and Master Project Manager of Global Risk Awareness. In cooperation with The Intelligence Community LLC, Flashpoint Partners, our data partner, Brand Energy and Digitalis (both companies responsible for all the lay out and development) GRA is a mobile application (app) that provides worldwide risk analysis and information that focuses on international security, which significantly benefits government, enterprises and independent users to assess the specific countries that require relations in order to conduct business operations in a safe, efficient, and secure manner.

title: Analyst, MENA
description: Provide subject matter expertise on current events in the Middle East and North Africa. Moderate discussions between industry experts. Create relational/professional bridges between the Intelligence Community LLC and intelligence community consumers, resulting in increased cooperation and effectiveness. Contributor to the "Ukraine Policy Playbook". My chapter will be focused with "The Potential of Conflict between Russia and Ukraine, Possibilities of De-escalation, and Reconciliation".

title: CEO
company: GEORISKANALYSIS - Global Risk Consultancy strategic partner and sister company of CW Prince & Assoc.
description: Georiskanalysis provide a wide range of very specialised global service. We are used dealing with high risk situations and complex operations. We are highly specialised with Terrorism, updating ourselves in a daily basis and providing specific reports worldwide. Risk & Threat Assessment Intel Analysis Cyber Security Training Academy (San Antonio, TX, USA) *Anti Terrorism & Combat Training *Executive Protection *Advanced Executive Protection Equipment (tailor made tech solution) We provide the most current and up to date operational methods for military, law enforcement and high level security professionals. Join us at our US Training site. We are committed at Georiskanalysis 24/7 Global Command Centre for immediate deployment anywhere in the world.

summary: •Well experienced in counter surveillance and counter intelligence with a vast experience at the field. Managed risk management Projects worldwide with a special emphasis in Africa, mostly in hostile environments. Former Team Leader of a Clandestine Unit. Played an active role as Intel Analyst for 2008 Angolan elections, as well as TL for 2010 World Soccer Cup in South Africa, mostly developed in Cape Town. •OSINT/MENA, HUMINT & SIGINT Research Analyst. •Expertise: Surveillance, Counter Surveillance, Terrorism. •Founder and Master Project Manager of Global Risk Awareness. In cooperation with The Intelligence Community LLC, Flashpoint Partners, our data partner, Brand Energy and Digitalis (both companies responsible for all the lay out and development) GRA is a mobile application (app) that provides worldwide risk analysis and information that focuses on international security, which significantly benefits government, enterprises and independent users to assess the specific countries that require relations in order to conduct business operations in a safe, efficient, and secure manner.

summary: •Well experienced in counter surveillance and counter intelligence with a vast experience at the field. Managed risk management Projects worldwide with a special emphasis in Africa, mostly in hostile environments. Former Team Leader of a Clandestine Unit. Played an active role as Intel Analyst for 2008 Angolan elections, as well as TL for 2010 World Soccer Cup in South Africa, mostly developed in Cape Town. •OSINT/MENA, HUMINT & SIGINT Research Analyst. •Expertise: Surveillance, Counter Surveillance, Terrorism. •Founder and Master Project Manager of Global Risk Awareness. In cooperation with The Intelligence Community LLC, Flashpoint Partners, our data partner, Brand Energy and Digitalis (both companies responsible for all the lay out and development) GRA is a mobile application (app) that provides worldwide risk analysis and information that focuses on international security, which significantly benefits government, enterprises and independent users to assess the specific countries that require relations in order to conduct business operations in a safe, efficient, and secure manner.

summary: •Well experienced in counter surveillance and counter intelligence with a vast experience at the field. Managed risk management Projects worldwide with a special emphasis in Africa, mostly in hostile environments. Former Team Leader of a Clandestine Unit. Played an active role as Intel Analyst for 2008 Angolan elections, as well as TL for 2010 World Soccer Cup in South Africa, mostly developed in Cape Town. •OSINT/MENA, HUMINT & SIGINT Research Analyst. •Expertise: Surveillance, Counter Surveillance, Terrorism. •Founder and Master Project Manager of Global Risk Awareness. In cooperation with The Intelligence Community LLC, Flashpoint Partners, our data partner, Brand Energy and Digitalis (both companies responsible for all the lay out and development) GRA is a mobile application (app) that provides worldwide risk analysis and information that focuses on international security, which significantly benefits government, enterprises and independent users to assess the specific countries that require relations in order to conduct business operations in a safe, efficient, and secure manner.

title: Manager - Sample Compliance
description: - Manage and supervise reporting personnel handling of the day-to-day assignments and periodic projects. - Oversee and escalate sample investigations that involve suspected diversions, loss of product, falsifications, and other sample non-compliance infractions that are required to be reported to the FDA, and/or NNI key stakeholders. - Responsible for reporting appropriate details to the FDA as required by the Prescription Drug Marketing Act (PDMA) and timelines applicable. - Manage, oversee and partner with internal stakeholders as it pertains to department’s disciplinary program and its applicability to the accountability and handling of product samples. - Monitor vendor data reports as it relates to Direct to Physician sampling programs - Act as a liaison for establishing and monitoring the business rules that are identified for third party vendors to adhere to, to ensure strict compliance with the PDMA and/or State regulations and NNI procedures. - Oversee and conduct periodic audits of other NNI areas that manage brand level Direct to Physician programs to ensure PDMA compliance. - Conduct activities during the reporting periods for CIA and the Sunshine Act to ensure plans and timelines are documented and executed properly - Manage the development of sample training programs/presentations conducted by reporting personnel; conduct trainings on a need-be basis - Author and/or provide support in the drafting of sample compliance related work instructions related to internal and field sales procedures and processes. Ensure that applicable direct reports are trained properly and in a timely manner. - Prepare statistical reports for management on a regular basis to identify trends and issues; and in preparation for annual NN Global Quality audit. - Identify system enhancements that incorporate improvements for monitoring deviations and non-compliance field activities.

title: Associate Project Manager - Compliance (Project Specialist, Aggregate Spend)
description: - Develop and deliver formalized system training and manage organizational change management activities related to any new compliance system implementation or enhancement - Develop and implement enhancements for communicating aggregate spend related information with stakeholders, customers and third party vendors - Identify areas of risk associated with compliance and develop recommendations around business solutions and systems to mitigate such risks - Interface with other departments as appropriate to communicate compliance information related to aggregate spend, transparency, and compliance monitoring and auditing activities - Manage technical compliance projects related to aggregate spend and transparency associated with HCP marketing and advertising payment information, grants and charitable contributions, clinical investigations and R&D payments, prescription drug samples, and HCP cap tracking and monitoring - Manage and oversee technical projects associated with data collection, compliance monitoring & auditing activities, and activities related to the Corporate Integrity Agreement - Contribute to business direction and requirements by supporting initiatives related to data management, data related systems, and vendors who provide data used to prepare and report federal and state report filings - Work with personnel responsible for monitoring, auditing, and investigations to ensure that any allegation or identified violation of company policy is properly investigated, remediation taken, and monitor controls established to prevent future instances - Manage day-to-day operations of all compliance systems, and work with internal personnel and external support on compliance-related projects and related business and technical solutions - Work with global HCP team to ensure that global payments are received timely, in the agreed upon format, and ensure that global affiliates remain educated with new and existing aggregate spend requirements

title: Senior Analyst, Health Care Compliance, Transparency, Metrics and Reporting
description: - Created and maintained a sustainable and robust reporting process to each state and government entity as required by law or policy - Analyzed and implement legislation requiring reporting and/or monitoring for both state and federal entities - Communicated and train appropriate individuals and teams on pending and current impact of legislation. Partnered with suppliers, legal community, internal business partners and Health Care Compliance (HCC) peers to ensure awareness and compliance to state and federal legislation - Provided reporting analysis in support of internal and external HCC regulations, procedures and policies - Worked with others on the team to proactively review proposed legislation and to make recommendations on policy changes and how to best implement the reporting requirements - Monitored all systems to enforce compliance to legislation - Partnered with technology partners to develop efficient reports, monitoring metrics and tools for key risk areas and legal requirements - Created and maintained standard operating procedure documentation to ensure all requirements are clearly understood, scheduled and supported and completed on time and with 100% accuracy

description: - Supported the SAP 3.1 and 4.6 applications and their E-commerce applications such as Easy Req and T&E. - Supported the SAP application during the upgrade of SAP 3.1 to SAP 4.6 - Supported the Ariba application during the upgrade of Ariba 6 to Ariba 7 - Provided help to all SAP users within BMS with issues related to Financial Shared Services - Assisted employees with SAP issues in the areas of Manugistics, and Demand and Supply Chain - Updated Lotus Notes documents to add corrected and current data - Resolved printer issues by troubleshooting using Dazel in a Unix environment - Assisted remote sales force with laptop issues, specifically with the Expres T&E application - Responsible for taking over the Accounts Payable Customer Service calls for internal clients, assisting clients with the creation of requisitions in SAP and in Ariba, helping clients check status of purchase orders, requisitions and checks in SAP and Ariba - Point person for Expres T&E, Supply Chain, and Site escalations - Assisted remote users to install and test applications - Assisted clients in English and Spanish - Utilized the Expert Advisor call tracking system - Trained and assisted new analysts - Ensured Service Level Agreement compliance with vendors - Point person for Supply Chain, Sourcing, Security and Maximo escalations - Utilized the Remedy call tracking system as of May 2002 - Assisted clients with Password Management as of October 2002

title: Chief of Corporate Learning
description: Established a new program in CIA to accelerate professional development across the Agency, as a means to improve overall mission performance. A key outcome was the Agency's first "Advanced Learning Framework," developed through partnerships across the US Government, academia, and with industry leaders. The framework is intended to increase the organization's ability to create, acquire and apply knowledge, build skills, and innovate fast enough to counter the rapidly changing and unpredictable threats to our our national security ... ultimately, giving us a vision of what is possible.
